body:
@celcius112 

I tried your project that simulates the issue, the main issue is coming from the following line

 `ClassPathElement classPathElement = classPathResourceIndex.getFirstClassPathElement(resourceName);`

which is load all available JAR, Module, and Directories

means, PersonFactory tries to access the Person which is expected to be found, on the actual issue is seems does not exist

issue.title: Force reloadability of project dependencies in QuarkusApplicationModelTask

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

issue.body:
This new Gradle task does not have proper means for workspace discovery, so for now we optimistically setWorkspaceModule() for project dependencies.

- Fixes: #48159.
